item.title: Voters express economic worries over inflation as costs rise, Fox News poll finds
item.description: A Fox News poll shows 76% of voters view the economy negatively, with 61% disapproving of President Donald Trump's economic handling amid rising costs...

item.title: DEI consultant resigns from Cracker Barrel board after heated proxy fight
item.description: Cracker Barrel shareholders backed nine of 10 board nominees, including CEO Julie Felss Masino.

item.title: December interest rate cut in doubt as Fed minutes show policymakers divided
item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers remain divided on December interest rate cuts as FOMC minutes revealed differing views on monetary policy amid inflation ...

item.title: US added 119K jobs in September, delayed jobs report shows
item.description: The Labor Department released the September jobs report, which showed that job growth continued at a subdued pace amid economic uncertainty over trade...

item.title: Walmart's strong quarter shows Americans are still spending
item.description: Walmart beats Wall Street expectations with strong food and health sales driving 6% revenue growth to $179.5 billion, raising outlook for fiscal 2026.
